Name: Shonen Adventure : The Dual Blades Hero
About the game: By playing this game you will begin a new journey in a fantasy dimension. You will start this adventure with only one thing : the potential to become the strongest hero. This VR RPG is a real challenge: explore the world, level up, unlock powerful elemental skills, sell your loot, buy items to increase specific stats and more. In parallel with this adventure, you will also be able to rank yourself among all the other players and try to reach the top by clearing instances as fast as possible. Train yourself, test multiple builds and try to be the best dual blades hero. Note that you will have the choice between smooth rotation and instant rotation but there is no teleportation system for the movements. Don't hesitate to join my discord server if you want to leave feedback, suggest new features, balancing adjustments or report bugs ! Finally I would like to give some thanks, I'm extremely grateful to the people who supported me during this long journey. Especially to the people who accepted to test the game, your feedback helped me so much to improve, it was awesome, thank you !
